item.title: 194 Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

So I’ve been messing with this client for the past couple days, and I can’t seem to get it to work. I’ve changed it to read the Cache and I’ve searched multiple forums and can’t find a fix for seeing as these are so rare. I am not a client guy, never have been and never will be. Any help is going to be appreciated.

I just get this, no matter what I change I get this. I have change the Cache to read from my C drive, and it still doesn’t read. I am clueless at this point.

public final DataInputStream method104(String string) throws IOException { if (signlink.mainapp != null) { return signlink.openurl(string); } return new DataInputStream(new URL("file:/c:/.file_store_32/" + string).openStream()); }
I believe that should make it read from the C drive, correct me if I am wrong.

Read full topic
